text: Pescia is a city in Tuscany, Italy. It is in a central zone between the cities Lucca and Florence. ==Important monuments and buildings== * Palazzo Palagio * Palazzo Della Barba * Cathedral * Communal Palace * City Library ==Economy== Economic activities of the city are about flowers and paper. ==Twin cities== * Nerja, Spain * Oullins, France Category:Cities in Tuscany Category:Settlements in Pistoia
title: Pescia
